entry.title: FREEZING RAIN WARNING , Doaktown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:48 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -6.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Doaktown 2:00 PM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
Temperature: -6.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 81 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -9.2°C
Wind: NE 12 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Ice pellets or snow. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning early this evening then changing to ice pellets mixed with freezing rain near midnight. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature rising to minus 1 by morning. Wind chill near minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets changing to rain mixed with freezing rain in the afternoon. Rainfall amount 10 mm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Sunday 15 January 2023
